targets.expr: sum(avg_over_time(oracledb_ora_metric_value{metric_name="Database Time Per Sec"}[$__range]) / 100) by (alias, instance, job)

sum(avg_over_time(oracledb_ora_metric_value{metric_name="Database Time Per Sec"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) / 100) by (alias, instance, job)
>= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

sum(avg_over_time(oracledb_ora_metric_value{metric_name="Host CPU Utilization (%)"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) / 100) by (alias, instance, job)
>= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

panels.description: The number of bytes that are currently used for local storage by all blocks.
panels.title: TSDB used Storage Size

panels.description:
Total number of series in the head block.
The "head" of the TSDB refers to the in-memory portion of the database that holds the most recent data.
panels.title: Head_series

list.description: Interval for refreshing the visualization of Graphs
list.label: interval
list.name: intv

list.description:
previous days, You can input directly.
ex) 4d, 6w
list.label: Comp. Period
list.name: diff_intv
